Title: initio-rpi
Description: Project aims at providing a fully functional rest service to access the sensors and controls of the 4tronix Initio Robot kit for RaspberryPi
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Project aims at providing a fully functional rest service to access the sensors and controls of the 4tronix Initio Robot kit for RaspberryPi

Dependencies
- Python3.4
- tornado or asyncio
- RPIO http://pythonhosted.org/RPIO/
